name: Cosmic Rings
description:
Play through 3 puzzles in space in order to save your friends. Use the cosmic rings to traverse through space.

IMPORTANT: The WebGL build of the game has a black screen while the game loads at the beginning and the Text popup at the beginning is cut off.  The mute button is also cut off unless you fullscreen the game. These bugs are fixed in the downloadable version of the game.

Made for Major Jam 4
